_xResult.title: Queen's Dreams Linen Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made linen maxi dress in any color
_xResult.longdesc:
As seen on TV! This is the stunning dress that wowed NBC News audiences. Now it can be yours!

 

Fashion visionary Aiste brings to life your dream dress in sculptured linen that uses textured seaming to add volume, shape and weight to this dress so you feel like you are a walking royal.  You'll love it in the seafoam color shown in the pictures, or have it made in any of dozens of colors available.  

 

Cap sleeves, V neck.  Comes with self belt. Prewashed flax linen, made to your exact measurements. Skirt is ankle length unless you specify otherwise. Please ensure we have your full body measurements including waist, bust, length from waist to shoulder and length from waist to ankle.

 

Aiste says, "This cocktail dress is made from my own unique textured fabric. I produce my hand-sewn fabrics beginning with rolls of plain material and sew hundreds of small seams onto it, creating my own unique textured fabric. Apparel from this texturized material will not become wrinkly! Wherever you go may simply pack them to your travel bag-no additional ironing is needed. -With Love, Aiste"

properties.propvalue: Hand wash cold, line dry. Dry clean ok.
